description: Returns information about the specified domain, including description and status. You can use IAM policies to control this action's access to Amazon SWF resources as follows: If the caller doesn't have sufficient permissions to invoke the action, or the parameter values fall outside the specified constraints, the action fails. The associated event attribute's cause parameter is set to OPERATION_NOT_PERMITTED. For details and example IAM policies, see Using IAM to Manage Access to Amazon SWF Workflows in the Amazon SWF Developer Guide.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the domain to describe.

nested_items.name: domainInfo
nested_items.description: The basic information about a domain, such as its name, status, and description.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the domain. This name is unique within the account.
REGISTERED --- The domain is properly registered and available. You can use this domain for registering types and creating new workflow executions.
DEPRECATED --- The domain was deprecated using  DeprecateDomain, but is still in use. You should not create new workflow executions in this domain.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the domain provided through  RegisterDomain.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: The domain configuration. Currently, this includes only the domain's retention period.

nested_items.name: workflowExecutionRetentionPeriodInDays
nested_items.description: The retention period for workflow executions in this domain.
